content_descriptors.notes: "Dwelling" contains intense and realistic depictions of violence and horror, which can be very disturbing. The game explores dark themes, including mental instability, supernatural occurrences, and tragic deaths. Some scenes may involve graphic violence, psychological terror, and unsettling imagery. This content is intended for mature audiences and may not be suitable for all ages. Player discretion is advised.

legal_notice:
Copyright and Trademark Statement

Game Title: Dwelling

Developer Information
Developer: Kodextra Studios
Parent Company: Kodextra Solutions OPC PVT LTD
Location: Pune, Maharashtra, India

Game Development Details

Platform: Unreal Engine
The game has been developed using Unreal Engine, adhering to its End User License Agreement (EULA). Unreal Engine provides the technical foundation for the game’s creation, allowing for high-quality graphics and immersive gameplay experiences.

3D Assets and Models:
All 3D assets and models used in "Dwelling " are created by Kodextra Studios, ensuring originality and consistency in the game's visual style. Any exceptions to this are specifically mentioned and appropriately credited within the game's documentation.

Music:
The game incorporates music sourced from various free asset libraries, primarily from Pixabay. These music assets are utilized under licenses that permit commercial use, ensuring compliance with copyright laws.

Copyright Information

All original content within "Dwelling” including but not limited to game mechanics, design, story, characters, 3D models, textures, animations, and code, is the exclusive intellectual property of Kodextra Studios and Kodextra Solutions OPC PVT LTD. This encompasses all creative and technical aspects developed by the team.

Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, modification, or any other use of the game's content without explicit written permission from Kodextra Solutions OPC PVT LTD is strictly prohibited. Any infringement on these rights may result in legal action to protect our intellectual property.

Trademark Information

The game title "Dwelling" and any associated logos, branding, and trademarks are the exclusive property of Kodextra Studios and Kodextra Solutions OPC PVT LTD. These trademarks are legally protected, and any unauthorized use of the game's title, logos, or branding is prohibited.
Permission for the use of these trademarks must be obtained through written consent from Kodextra Solutions OPC PVT LTD. Unauthorized use may lead to legal consequences to safeguard our brand identity.

Third-Party Assets

3D Assets and Models:
Any third-party 3D assets and models included in the game are properly licensed and credited. The creators of these assets are acknowledged in the game's documentation and credits section, ensuring transparency and respect for their contributions.

Music:
The music assets sourced from Pixabay and other free asset libraries comply with their respective licensing agreements, which allow for commercial use in the game. Proper attribution is provided where required by the license terms.

Acknowledgments

Kodextra Studios acknowledges the creators and contributors of third-party assets used in "Dwelling: FPP Horror Game." Specific credits are provided within the game's documentation and credits section to ensure proper recognition of their work.

Contact Information

For any queries or permissions related to the game's content, please contact Kodextra Solutions OPC PVT LTD at:
Email: studio@kodextra.com
Kodextra Studios and Kodextra Solutions OPC PVT LTD are committed to maintaining compliance with copyright and trademark laws, ensuring that all content used in "Dwelling: FPP Horror Game" is legally and ethically sourced.
